xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnFinancialR: Operating Activities 1. Adjustments for decrease (increase) in trade receivables, current â€“ This item includes increase or decrease in both Current and Non-current Trade Receivables 2. Adjustments for decrease (increase) in other current assets - This item includes increase or decrease in both Current and Non-current Other Assets 3. Adjustments for other financial assets, current - This item includes increase or decrease in Unbilled receivables and contract assets 4. Adjustments for increase (decrease) in trade payables, current - This item includes increase or decrease in Current and Non-current Trade payables, Accrued Expenses, Provisions and Other Liabilities 5. Adjustments for other financial liabilities, current - This item includes increase or decrease in Contract Liabilities 6. Other adjustments to reconcile profit (loss) - This item includes Gain on sale of property, plant and equipment 7. Adjustments for finance costs- This item includes Finance and other income, Net of finance costs Investing Activities 7. Payments to acquire or redeem entity's shares - This item includes Payment for buy back of shares, including transaction cost and Payment of tax on buyback of shares
